Palatine.Charles H. Patten House:
The Charles H. Patten House is a Chateauesque and Queen Anne style home located at 17 N. Benton Street in Palatine, Illinois. It was designed by Julius F. Wegman for Charles H. Patten, a prominent local businessman who was also mayor of Palatine from 1894 to 1895.


== History ==
Charles H. Patten was born in 1853 and grew up on a farm near Palatine.
